message: Hello Bob, I have a product that I believe would be highly beneficial for you. Given its quality and market value, I'm offering it to you for $12500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering my budget and the value I expect to get from it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. While I understand budget considerations, I need to point out that the product is worth significantly more than $8000. My minimum acceptable price is $10000, which is already quite reasonable considering the value you'll receive. I can't go below this price as it represents my bottom line. Would you be able to meet me at $10000?
